config_description: /** * Database setting ANALYZE_SAMPLE (default: 10000). * The default sample size when analyzing a table. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code retrieves the value of ANALYZE_SAMPLE from the database settings and uses it as the sample size when analyzing a table.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered when the analyzeTables method is called and the conditions for analyzing tables are met. The frequency of triggering depends on how often the analyzeTables method is called in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the ANALYZE_SAMPLE configuration option is on the sample size used when analyzing a table. A larger sample size can provide more accurate analysis results but may also increase the processing time and resource usage.
